MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Penyffordd affecting properties in Fairview, Westfield Drive and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 5:20am. Our engineers have arrived on site and suspect the powercut has been caused by an underground cable fault.  We have additional resources on their way to site to assist and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29am on 15th December 2020
